name: smplfi Cities
description:
Create complex cities in seconds featuring:
Featuring:
– Hundreds of thousands of unique character names with traits, relationships, and behaviors that adapt based on their culture, environment, and profession
– Districts and Location types driven by two distinct genres and influenced by the attributes of your city
– Streamlined note-taking at both the location and character level so you never forget the important details that can breathe life into your stories and adventures!
